title: SEND - Digital Notification Service | SEND Numbers
description: Discover data related to sent notifications, entities using SEND, and types of service data

sent_notifications.title: SEND notifications sent
sent_notifications.description: The data refers to legally binding communications sent by participating entities.

total.name: overall
total.title: Total SEND notifications sent
total.description: A SEND notification is a legally binding communication officially issued by an administration. It can be delivered digitally or in analog format.

digital.name: digital
digital.title: Number of digital SEND notifications
digital.description: SEND notifications issued to recipients through certified digital channels.

analog.name: analog
analog.title: Number of analog SEND notifications
analog.description: SEND notifications issued in analog format due to the absence of certified digital channels for the recipient.

trend.title: SEND notifications trend
trend.description: Trend of the number of SEND notifications officially issued by a participating entity.
trend.note: The cumulative value is the progressive sum of a quantity over time.

entities.title: Entities on SEND
entities.description: Participating entities that have sent at least one SEND notification since the service launch.

total.title: Total entities on SEND
total.description: Total number of entities that have sent at least one SEND notification.

municipalities.title: Percentage of municipalities out of total entities on SEND

geographic_distribution.title: Geographic distribution of municipalities on SEND
geographic_distribution.description: The chart shows the distribution of municipalities in different regions, the size of the bubbles indicates the volume of active municipalities per region.

tooltip.percentage: Percentage of municipalities relative to total municipalities per region

notification_types.title: Main areas of SEND notifications
notification_types.description: Categories of most sent SEND notifications.

main_scopes.title: Filter by type of participating entity.
main_scopes.notes: * different from those whose notification is excluded through SEND pursuant to art. 26, paragraph 17 D.L. 76/2020
